effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 655,179.
Set: When you cast Healing Rain, 1 ally in the radius has Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
